title: 2013 GMC Sierra CrewCab 6.2L with Gibson Swept Side Exhaust
description:
Part # 315625
11-13 Chevrolet Silverado/ GMC Sierra 1500 Truck 6.2L Crew Cab,Short Bed/Extended Cab, Standard Bed

Gibson Single Swept Side Exhaust is perfect for improved acceleration, maximum hill climbing, towing and passing power. This is our best performing Exhaust System. Exits behind the rear tire. Quieter in the cab than any other Performance Exhaust. Dyno test results show it makes maximum torque and horsepower at low-end (1800 to 3000 RPM). Horsepower gains average 10-15 and 15-20lb-ft of increase torque. Hassle free, bolt-on installation with professional looking results. No welding required. Backed by a Lifetime Limited Warranty. Backed by a Lifetime Lilmited Warranty.

– 3.5-in. aluminized mandrel bent tubing.
– Gibson Muffler features a baffled & chambered design, no internal packing, powerful deep tone.
– 4in.; Polished; T304 Stainless; Round; Slash- Cut Tip; Clamp on.
– Exits In Stock Location.
– Includes all hardware and factory style hangers for easy bolt on installation.
– Fits vehicles with a ball flange.
– Lifetime Limited Warranty
tags: Gibson Exhaust Systems, performance exhaust, cat-back exhaust, Chevy Silverado, GMC Sierra, 1500, gibson 315625
